contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Moriyama |JapaneseName= 守山市 |MapImage= Moriyama in Shiga Prefecture.png |Region=[[Kansai region|Kansai]] |Prefecture=[[Shiga Prefecture|Shiga]] |District= |Area_km2= 55.73 |PopDate= August 1, 2011 |Population= 77,384 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 35 |LatitudeMinutes= 3 |LatitudeSeconds= 31 |LongtitudeDegrees= 135 |LongtitudeMinutes= 59 |LongtitudeSeconds= 39 |Tree= [[Cinnamomum camphora]] |Flower= [[Nelumbo nucifera]] |Bird= |SymbolImage=Flag of Moriyama Shiga.JPG |SymbolDescription= Flag |Mayor= Kazuhiro Miyamoto |CityHallPostalCode= 524-8585 |CityHallAddress= 5-22, 2-chome, Yoshimi, Moriyama-shi, Shiga-ken |CityHallPhone= 077-583-2525 |CityHallLink= [http://www.city.moriyama.shiga.jp/ City of Moriyama] }} {{nihongo|'''Moriyama'''|守山市|Moriyama-shi}} is a [[cities of Japan|city]] located in [[Shiga Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. As of August 1, 2011, the city has an estimated [[population]] of 77,384 and the [[population density|density]] of 1,390 persons per km². The total area is 55.73 km². The city was founded on July 1, 1970. Its sister city is [[Adrian, Michigan|Adrian]], [[Michigan]], [[United States]]. == External links == {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.city.moriyama.shiga.jp/ Official website] {{ja icon}} {{Shiga}} [[Category:Cities in Shiga Prefecture]] {{Shiga-geo-stub}}
